watches.name: Gentleman
watches.description: The Tissot Gentleman is a multi-purpose watch, both ergonomic and elegant in any circumstance. It is equally suitable for wearing in a business environment, where conventional dress codes apply, as at the weekend, when it adapts easily to leisure activities.

watches.name: PR 100 Chonograph
watches.description: The Tissot Gentleman is a multi-purpose watch, both ergonomic and elegant in any circumstance. It is equally suitable for wearing in a business environment, where conventional dress codes apply, as at the weekend, when it adapts easily to leisure activities.

watches.name: Lovely Square
watches.description: A tribute to the small Tissot ladies' watches of the 1960s, the Tissot Lovely Square is an utterly feminine creation, calibrated for the finest wrists. With delicate 2 x 2 cm dimensions, it is nonetheless bold in its square design, and its satin-smooth case glimmers whatever the season.

watches.name: Day-Date 36
watches.description: Its dial features diamonds in 18 ct gold settings and baguette-cut diamonds at 6 and 9 o'clock. The Day-Date was the first watch to indicate the day of the week spelt out in full when it was first presented in 1956.

watches.name: Yacht-Master
watches.description: A new jewel shines on the surface of the sea: for the first time, the Yacht-Master 42 is available in yellow gold â€“ an inspired and original refinement to the emblematic sailing timepiece that in no way alters its course.

watches.name: Lady-DateJust
watches.description: Its dial features a large VI set with diamonds. The light reflections on the case sides and lugs highlight the elegant profile of the 31 mm Oyster case, which is fitted with a diamond-set bezel. Aesthetically, the Datejust has spanned eras, while retaining the enduring codes that make it, notably in its traditional versions, one of the most recognized and recognizable of watches.

watches.name: Black Blaken Explorer
watches.description: The additional arrow-shaped 24-hour hand of the Explorer II circles the dial once a day and is used in relation to the engraved fixed bezel.
